name: Pages of Insanity
description:
Pages of insanity is a short horror game in which you have to search 4 pages scattered around the map!

Hey,

this is my first 3D game that I did in around 2 weeks, so please do not expect anything big or "game-changing". :)

Everything you see is drawn by me(please bear in mind that im not really good with drawing or arts in general :D).

Positive or negative criticism is highly welcomed!
